Description: Adorable 2 bedroom unit with heat & hot water included - available for rent in September! A commuters dream location next to the Brookline Village Station (green line). This bright unit has a fantastic open kitchen with hightop seating, stainless appliances with backsplash and recessed lighting throughout the unit. Both bedrooms have ceiling fans, the larger bedroom has a walk-in closet. Clean bathroom with tiled tub. Pets under 30lbs would be considered by the landlord. Unit comes with 1 car parking, extra storage and shared laundry in the building. First, security and realtor fee required. Contact agent for a private showing.
